front.title: Format for Diffserv Working Group Traffic Conditioner Drafts

abstract.t: This draft outlines the format and required content for traffic conditioner drafts that are submitted to the Differentiated Services Working Group (Diff-Serv). This format is specified to expedite working group review of traffic conditioner submissions. The keywords 'MUST', 'MUST NOT', 'REQUIRED', 'SHOULD', 'SHOULD NOT', and 'MAY' that appear in this document are to be interpreted as described in [RFC2119].
